sentences.sContent: I even have a wooden mallet that was used by a judge over 300 years ago during condemnation proceedings in Salem.
sentences.sContent_eng: I even have a wooden mallet that was used by a judge over 300 years ago during condemnation proceedings in Salem.
sentences.sCn: 我甚至还有一把300多年前的木槌。

sentences.sContent: The water-filled bowls, when rubbed with a leather-wrapped mallet, exhibit a lively dance of water droplets as they emit a haunting sound.
sentences.sContent_eng: The water-filled bowls, when rubbed with a leather-wrapped mallet, exhibit a lively dance of water droplets as they emit a haunting sound.
sentences.sCn: 在用皮革包裹的木槌摩擦倒满水的碗时，碗里的水滴会跳起生动的舞蹈，同时它们发出萦绕不绝的声音。

trans.tranOther: a wooden hammer with a large end
